derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent. (denoting a kind of loose gown worn by women in the 18th cent.): from French, literally given little thought or attention', feminine past participle of négliger 'to neglect'

entry.def: A negligee is a very thin garment which a woman wears over her nightclothes.

means.word_mean: 1. a loose dressing gown for women
